info.author: Philip J Grabner, Cadit Health Inc
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
=======
RIAdiff
=======

The Rich Internet Application (RIA) regression testing tool,
**riadiff**, allows you to easily take a snapshot of the look, feel,
behaviour, and workflow of a web application's user interface. Then,
as you make changes to your application, riadiff will help you ensure
that your application changes only in those ways that you intended.

.. warning::

  2013/11/01: riadiff is currently being refactored -- come back in a
  couple of weeks.


Project Info
============

* Project Page: https://github.com/cadithealth/riadiff
* Bug Tracking: https://github.com/cadithealth/riadiff/issues
info.keywords: selenium webdriver testing regression ui automated visual diff screenshot huxley
